data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Kentucky, United States.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kentucky, United States
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Kentucky, United States, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,180,991 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Kentucky, United States to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Kurd, Central people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kentucky, United States.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kentucky, United States so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kentucky, United States has a population of 4,472,400.

We estimate Kentucky has 1,180,991 people who might know Jesus, 2,239,988 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,051,421 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make the 2,239,988 people in the state of Kentucky who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.
